headline: Align Technology, Inc. (ALGN): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Align Technology, Inc. on Stock Analysis Compilation’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ALGN. Align Technology, Inc.’s share was trading at $204.13 as of July 23rd. ALGN’s trailing and forward P/E were 37.11 and 20.00, respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
